MONEY-BACK GUARANTEED:

Money back guarantee is relevant for 45 days. Full refund will be given, if money back is demanded within 15 days.

Our Specialties:

What makes us unique and why should you put your trust and money into becoming a customer of KVCwebhosting.com?

We have a team of technical people to handle the servers and manage the website all round the year.

i) Support: we at KVCwebhosting are here 24/7, 365 days to help you. Our fully trained sales and support staff will be available for contact through Email, Live Chats or Phone 24/7, 365 days - meaning any problems that may arise, will be solved within minutes of it being discovered.

ii) Reliability: A highly reliable service is essential, especially when you have customers that rely on your website being online at all times. we offer you a 99.9% uptime network guarantee and 24 x 7 uninterrupted services.

iii) Affordability - During the modern day recession, a business must manage money appropriately and make the most of it's budgets.
